channel.title: Registrar - Degree Cert & Study Abroad Unit
channel.description: Calendar for Office of the Registrar Degree Certification and Study Abroad Unit dates important to Urbana-Champaign faculty, staff and students

item.title: Begin daily Graduation Application Inactivation script for ALL with Graduation Status of "IA"
item.description: Graduation Application Inactivation script ran to change Graduation Status of "IA" (inactivate) to "NETT" (Not Eligible for This Term) for UG, Graduate and Professional so that the students can apply for graduation for future term.

item.title: Send 2nd graduation verification email to students regarding name displayed on diploma and diploma mailing address
item.description: Emails are sent to students on the graduation list requesting verification of how the student's name should appear on the diploma and what address should be used for mailing the diploma.

item.title: First GCP batch degree update in Banner
item.description: First Graduation Certification Process (GCP) degree update in Banner for all pending degree records with Graduation Status of "CT" and Outcome Status of "PN".

item.title: Second GCP batch degree update in Banner
item.description: Second Graduation Certification Process (GCP) degree update in Banner for all pending degree records with Graduation Status of "CT" and Outcome Status of "PN".

item.title: Deadline to submit name change for diploma name or unique diploma name
item.description: Final date for all graduating students to submit a request for a diploma name change or unique diploma name to the Registrar's Office.

item.title: Third GCP batch degree update in Banner
item.description: Third Graduation Certification Process (GCP) degree update in Banner for all pending degree records with Graduation Status of "CT" and Outcome Status of "PN".

item.title: Deadline for graduating students to submit transcripts for transfer and study abroad coursework
item.description: Final date for all graduating students to submit transcripts for transfer and study abroad coursework.  Transcripts must be received on the UIUC campus by this date.

item.title: Deadline to add or update address to receive diploma
item.description: Diploma will be sent to Diploma Address or Permanent Address if no Diploma Address exists approximately nine weeks after the degree is awarded. Addresses can be updated from the Personal Information menu via Student Self-Service or email the Office of the Registrar (registration@illinois.edu).

item.title: End Banner degree certification process.
item.description: As of 5 p.m., colleges are no longer able to certify degrees using Banner. A Graduation Coding Form must be filled out, signed and submitted to the Graduation Unit, Office of the Registrar, to late add the degree.

item.title: Final GCP batch degree update in Banner
item.description: Final Graduation Certification Process (GCP) degree update in Banner for all pending degree records with Graduation Status of "CT" and Outcome Status of "PN".

item.title: Final Graduation Application Inactivation for all graduation applications that have not been awarded.
item.description: Graduation Application Inactivation script ran to change Graduation Status of "IA" (inactivate) to "NETT" (Not Eligible for This Term) for UG, Graduate and Professional so that the students can apply for graduation for future term.

item.title: Final degree list available in ViewDirect
item.description: List all the degrees that have been awarded as of the final degree update. The file is sorted by college then alpha order by last name.

item.title: Graduated and future register list available in ViewDirect
item.description: List of students who have registered for the future term under the same degree program after the degrees have been awarded. The file is sorted by college then by last name in alpha order.

item.title: Release of transcript orders held for degree
item.description: Transcript requests held for degree to be posted/awarded in UI permanent academic records will be generated/printed and send to recipient's address provided by the requestors.

item.title: Diploma order submitted for printing
item.description: Graduation Unit submits the order of awarded degrees to the printing company for the diplomas to be printed and mailed.

item.title: First GCP batch degree update in Banner
item.description: First Graduation Certification Process (GCP) degree update in Banner for all pending degree records with Graduation Status of "CT" and Outcome Status of "PN".

item.title: Second GCP batch degree update in Banner
item.description: Second Graduation Certification Process (GCP) degree update in Banner for all pending degree records with Graduation Status of "CT" and Outcome Status of "PN".

item.title: Final GCP batch degree update in Banner
item.description: Final Graduation Certification Process (GCP) degree update in Banner for all pending degree records with Graduation Status of "CT" and Outcome Status of "PN".
